title: Staked
desc: Stake your ETH on Ethereum 2.0 and watch your rewards grow
about: Staked helps institutional investors reliably and securely compound their crypto assets by 5% - 100% annually via staking and lending.
do-not-have-eth2: Don't have it yet? {generate} an Eth2 address
read-and-agree: I have read and agree to {terms-of-service}
done-desc: Your request is converting. A notification will be sent to you while it’s completed.
error-not-enough-bal: There is not enough balance in your account
error-try-again: Something went wrong! Please try again or contact our support at support@myetherwallet.com.
error-set-amount: Please enter or select a multiple of 32 ETH
error-keystore: Please upload a valid keystore file
warning: During Phase 0, users are only able to deposit and stake their ETH. Users will not be able to withdraw their ETH until Phase 2, which may not go into effect until 2022.

generate-address.title: Generate an Eth2 Address
generate-address.desc: Eth2 addresses are also known 'validator keypairs'. Each validator will receive a keystore file, recovery phrase, and a public key for their Eth2 stake. What is an Eth2 address? {learn-more}
generate-address.desc2: Eth2 withdrawal addresses are used to withdraw your staked ETH and rewards. Each validator will receive an Eth2 withdrawal address, a keystore file, and a recovery phrase for their Eth2 stake.
generate-address.warning: Don't lose your {password-keystore}! They hold your keys and are necessary for future access. {no-one}, so it's very important you take care of them.
generate-address.no-one: No one can recover these for you
generate-address.password-keystore: Eth2 Keystore file + password + recovery phrase
generate-address.error-pw-strength: Please enter a strong password to continue
generate-address.mnemonic-desc: Please write down your recovery phrase and download your keystore file. Keep both of these secure, we cannot recover them for you.
generate-address.message-wait: Please wait while we generate your keystore file...
generate-address.generated-successfully: Your have generated an Eth2 address successfully.
